attack.name: hack
attack.help: /ack hack _targetname_ : Direct hack on given target for X damage. Yields credits and possibly a secret, as indicated by target status.

attack2.name: hsync
attack2.help: /ack hsync _targetname_ : Coordinated hack on given target for X damage. Only succeeds if 2 or more people perform this on the same target on the same turn.

attack2X.name: hsync+
attack2X.help: /ack hsync+ _targetname_ : Coordinated hack on given target for X damage. Only succeeds if 2 or more people perform this on the same target on the same turn. If you attempt this and it does not suceeded, you lose 100 credits.

defend.name: wall
defend.help: /ack wall _targetname_ : Defense of given target to prevent X damage.

defend2.name: ssync
defend2.help: /ack ssync _targetname_ : Coordinated defense of given target to prevent X damage. Only succeeds if 2 or more people perform this on the same target on the same turn.

expose.name: expose
expose.help: /ack expose _playername_ : Reveal a secret you've collected on given player, causing them to lose X% of their credits. This costs 2 moves.

transferSecret.name: transfer-secret
transferSecret.help: /ack transfer-secret _toplayername_ _secretplayername_ : Transfer a secret you've collected to another player. You will no longer have access to this secret.

transferCreds.name: transfer-credits
transferCreds.help: /ack transfer-credits _toplayername_ _credits_ : Transfer some of your credits to another player.
